title: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry can not be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource
description: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry can not be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource. Therefore, all the resources that are being looked up are only the ones relative to the location of the FontRegistry class, org.eclipse.jface.resource path. It can be remedied if FontRegistry took a client class (or class loader) as an additional parameter to the constructor.
